name: Escape From Abandoned Town
description:
Game created in part by students through a game art workshop hosted by Creative Barracks. The art has been created, and levels designed by 4 students ranging from 10 to 16, and programmed by Atom Dellow, with hosting and teaching by Lacie Williamson at Creative Barracks. 

The game follows a robot who's escaped, and has to go through 4 levels of varying difficulty to reach finally escape.
